actions: Clears Heat, relieves Fire toxicity and clears hot sores (Chuang Yung) internally and externally.
With Ye Ju Hua, for carbuncles and other red swellings.
With Pu Gong Ying, for furuncles, boils and carbuncles.
Reduces abscesses, dissipates nodules, clears Heat, resolves Dampness, relieves Fire toxicity and clears Heat in the Blood.
Drains Damp-Heat from the Liver and Gallbladder channels.
Drains Damp-Heat especially from the Lower Jiao, drains Fire and relieves Fire toxicity.

notes: Decoct and use to fumigate and wash the affected area, twice a day.
